Sentencas: Thermodynamic analyses in the literature have shown that solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with proton conducting electrolyte (H-SOFC) exhibited higher performance than SOFC with oxygen ion conducting electrolyte (O-SOFC).
Titulo: Thermodynamic Analysis of Methane-fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Considering CO Electrochemical Oxidation

Sentencas: However, these studies only consider H-2 electrochemical oxidation and totally neglect the contribution of CO electrochemical oxidation in O-SOFC.
Titulo: Thermodynamic Analysis of Methane-fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Considering CO Electrochemical Oxidation

Sentencas: In this short communication, a thermodynamic model is developed to compare the theoretically maximum efficiencies of H-SOFC and O-SOFC, considering the electrochemical oxidation of CO in O-SOFC anode.
Titulo: Thermodynamic Analysis of Methane-fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Considering CO Electrochemical Oxidation

Sentencas: It is found that O-SOFC exhibits a higher maximum efficiency than H-SOFC due to the contribution from CO electrochemical oxidation, which is contrary to the common understanding of electrolyte effect on SOFC performance.
Titulo: Thermodynamic Analysis of Methane-fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Considering CO Electrochemical Oxidation

Sentencas: The effects of operating temperature and fuel utilization factor on the theoretical efficiency of SOFC are also analyzed and discussed.
Titulo: Thermodynamic Analysis of Methane-fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Considering CO Electrochemical Oxidation
Thermodynamic Analysis of Methane-fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Considering CO Electrochemical Oxidation

Sentencas: The Chemical Industry and Engineering Society of China, and Chemical Industry Press.
Titulo: Thermodynamic Analysis of Methane-fueled Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Considering CO Electrochemical Oxidation
